pullRequest.title: Addition of a new AmmoType equals method that only compares AmmoType …
pullRequest.bodyText:
…and not rack size.
This fixes MekHQ issue 1665.
This is the MegaMek side fix for MekHQ PR 1730.

commit.message:
Addition of a new AmmoType equals method that only compares AmmoType and not rack size.
This fixes MekHQ issue 1665.

nodes.bodyText: I'm almost certain this will cause issues relating to being able to reuse AC2 ammo for AC20, etc.

commit.message:
Remove equals helper methods as they are no longer needed.
Move all original Ammo flag checks from equals to equalsAmmoTypeOnly.
Modify equals to check equalsAmmoTypeOnly && rack size.
